SEARCH
Package bto.Data

Class EnquiryCSVDao

java.lang.Object
bto.Data.EnquiryCSVDao
All Implemented Interfaces:
EnquiryDao
public class EnquiryCSVDao extends Object implements EnquiryDao
Implementation of the EnquiryDao interface for managing enquiries using a CSV file as the data source.
